channel.title: How do you add items to shops?
channel.description: I want to add more items to my shops in my private server, how can I add more items in the shops?

item.title: How do you add items to shops?
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Please make sure to use the search bar, and if need be, click the magnifying glass to the left of it to make your search more accurate.

But to answer your question, go into your shops.cfg file. Then find the shop in which you want to add items. Then click on the last number in that row, and make sure you hit TAB (DO NOT USE SPACE AS IT WILL MAKE NULLS). Then type in the item ID that you want to add to the shop, and hit TAB again, then type in the quantity of the item you want to add.

Save it and compile it.

Hope I helped. =]

Read full topic
item.source: How do you add items to shops?
